properties.name: suda.io.xss-attack.check-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用XSS攻击检查，默认不启用.

properties.name: suda.io.xss-attack.servlet-path-whitelist
properties.description: 配置XSS攻击检查的接口白名单.

properties.name: suda.io.xss-attack.xss-regex-list
properties.description: 配置检查XSS攻击的正则表达式.

properties.name: suda.io.sql-inject.check-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用SQL注入攻击检查，默认不启用.

properties.name: suda.io.sql-inject.servlet-path-whitelist
properties.description: 配置SQL注入攻击检查接口白名单.

properties.name: suda.io.sql-inject.sql-keyword-list
properties.description: 配置检查SQL注入攻击的关键字.

properties.name: suda.io.files.check-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用文件安全检查，包括：文件扩展名黑名单、文件扩展名被篡改等。默认不启用.

properties.name: suda.io.files.servlet-path-whitelist
properties.description: 配置文件安全检查接口白名单.

properties.name: suda.io.files.extension-blacklist
properties.description: 配置文件扩展名黑名单.
